rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a Vastu aligned positioning to the east for positive energy.
Spacious living area incorporating Art Deco elements and natural lighting, centered around the courtyard view.
Efficient kitchen with modern appliances. Vastu compliant, placed in the northeast for auspicious energy.
Dedicated home office designed to facilitate productivity while integrating Art Deco aesthetics and natural light from the courtyard.
Functional bathroom with tiled finishes; placed in the north-west section as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Strategically placed for optimal cross ventilation and natural light, adhering to Vastu principles.
Main entrance door aligned with the east for auspicious entry according to Vastu norms.
Large garage door providing access to a two-car garage, designed in Art Deco style with streamlined motifs.

courtyard.description: A serene central courtyard designed for relaxation and natural light, enhancing the overall ambience of the bungalow.

elements.description: Art Deco styled water fountain to promote positive energy flow.
Native plants arranged in geometric patterns, aligning with Art Deco design and Vastu principles.
